Currently manages a team of over 100 contractors and internal employees that focus on the areas of interactive marketing, public relations, and social media management and compliance (HIPAA, FINRA, FDA, FTC, etc.)  As CEO Amanda is in charge of managing sales, partnerships with other agencies,  client acquisition, as well as the management of the subsidiaries of the firm (PR in a Jar and Basic Social Media.) More info can be found at http://www.amandavega.com.   Clients include WebMD, Banana Republic, Sears, British Airways, Publicis Modem, Agency.com, eHarmony and more. The team now spans 15 countries.

GABERCO is the Global Association of Baby Equipment Rental Companies. The mission of the organization is to support baby equipment and gear rental companies across the world through marketing and sales support, standards of provisions, discounts on supplies and other support services and more. In addition, the organization will support the consumer through creating standards of equipment, customer interactions, and more.

Founder of 3 Peas Baby Gear Rental - a company that allows those traveling to rent the best baby gear, rather than lugging it with them. (Focus on Arizona currently, with expansion planned for Q4 2016.)

3 Peas Baby Product Marketing focuses on PR, marketing, social media, and related services to help inventors of products in the juvenile space expand and reach consumers and buyers. We help take your idea from concept to registry-must.

Rhino is a close strategic partner of Amanda Vega Consulting. Amanda worked on site to provide Rhino and Rhino's incredible client list with interactive marketing services and consulting.  Responsible for creation, management, and execution of Rhino’s interactive marketing and advertising division/department.  This position oversaw the strategies and implementation for the new services that lie under the umbrella of “marketing services” within the company and for their clients. This was a strategic partnership for Amanda Vega Consulting.She was responsible for the development and management of the Interactive Marketing Services Division which includes strategy planning and implementation, education of internal employees, sales to current and future clients, and management of all internal and client marketing, advertising, and public relations efforts.Amanda Vega Consulting still maintains a great partnership with team Rhino.

Erika L. Watson
Cutting-Edge Event Producer | Dynamic Public Speaker Design Studio Owner
February 25, 2014, Amanda was a client of Erika L.’s

As the owner of a national marketing consultancy, I have met and worked with numerous event planners over the last 15+ years, and it wasn't until I met Erika at White Hot Events that I learned that there's a true difference between event planning and event production.  Erika is an even producer - meaning she doesn't just help you choose tablecloths, centerpieces and staging; she helps you create and execute an experience. Erika is what I call a Maguyver in Stilettos. If you have a vision for your event, she makes it happen; even when others cannot. And it doesn't just happen by making calls to warehouses of vendors - at times it happens because she literally designs, engineers, and builds it herself. That ability, coupled with her clearly innate talent for design and aesthetic ensures that events managed by her are the ones that you talk about for years, whether personal or corporate.

summary: Amanda Vega is an interactive industry dinosaur who began her career over 20 years ago as a chat moderator at AOL, later helping develop some of AOL’s signature products like AIM and Love@AOL.  After working her way up the ranks, she left the company to work with other industry pioneers, starting an agency that helped create and grow many of the online marketing capabilities and services many people currently take for granted, until acquisition by Ogilvy. For the past two decades, she has served as CEO of a consulting firm that works with both agencies and brands, in the areas of PR, social media management, compliance services, and other web-related activities, serving clients nationally from five locations, serving clients such as Banana Republic, WebMD, General Mills, Sears, Publicis Groupe, LG, British Airways, Sanofi, and many more. As an expansion of that agency, she also founded 3 Peas Baby Product marketing - a firm that specifically services the juvenile product industry. And most recently 3 Peas Baby Gear Rental which rents high-end baby gear to those traveling to Arizona and connects juvenile brands to affluent parents. Amanda is a published author (she wrote “PR in a Jar” was a contributing author for “The Social Media Bible”), Columbia University MBA grad, and frequently speaks at events. She's a Founding Member of GABERCO - the Global Association for Baby Equipment Rental, and actively involved in many Boards.When she’s not out being a pink Porsche driving Pug owner known for her snark, Amanda is seeking new opportunities for investment or growth. Or awaiting a crazy acquisition or dream job that she just cannot refuse (like being Victor Newman's daughter on the Young & the Restless.)
name: Amanda Vega
title: CEO with 20+ years interactive experience. PR Maven. Social Media Zealot. Published Author. Professional speaker.
